price: Entre los signos [de Su misericordia] están los barcos que navegan en el mar, grandes como montañas.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
